shows.title: Woodwork for Wellbeing
shows.desc: Come hang out with us, relax and have a go at some woodwork. Make a bird box or do some carving. Take anything you make home with you for free. No experience necessary - all tools, materials and tuition provided. Absolute beginners to master craftspeople welcome. Just bring yourselves.
